For Pages
*
* On Fridays and Saturdays, we accept reservations for parties of 12 or less only. If we are able to accommodate any party larger than 12 guests, it will be billed 1 check.  For all parties of 9 or more, a fee of $12 per guest will be charged for no-shows and cancellations within 24 hours prior to the reservation.**
For private group reservations, please call 904-233-4110 or email events@river-grp.com.**
JOIN US FOR THE BEST brunch IN JAX!
every saturday & sunday  11am-4PM
For Galleries
For Albums
For Pages
Reserve Your Table Today
Reservations are for 1st floor dining room only.  Our Rooftop Lounge is first come first served.
**In order to provide the best possible experience for our guests, take out orders will be available during 11am to 4pm Tuesday through Sunday. Please call 904-575-2366 to check for availability.
Book your River & Post reservation on Resy

For Galleries

For Pages
Our Vision
River & Post is a culinary driven restaurant in a warm, modern setting where we strive to captivate our guests with quality ingredients, impeccable service and memorable accommodations for any occasion.
River and Post opened its doors on November 20, 2017.
Gallery
Main Image
Products: Quick View
Main Image
Products: Quick View
Main Image
Products: Quick View
For Galleries
For Albums
For Pages
IN THE NEWS
We are thrilled to announce that the River Restaurant Group has partnered with Diamond D Ranch to provide fresh local beef at our restaurants in both Jacksonville and St. Augustine!  Please check out the video to hear about their amazing cattle farm and more on our partnership.
With a restaurant perched high atop a prominent Riverside building, the team behind River & Post took a commanding view of Jacksonville’s landscape and entered the city’s culinary scene with a delectable seafood-forward menu and easily the best rooftop view in town. While the 450-seat restaurant offers great food, atmosphere and cocktails, the rooftop lounge offers some of the most unique cocktails in town that are handcrafted nightly for guests.
More News & Upcoming Events
For Galleries
For Albums
For Pages
Contact Us
Fill out this form to send us a message.
If you are trying to make a reservation, please call us at 904-575-2366 or utilize the RESY app above under the RESERVATIONS tab.

IN THE NEWS
We are thrilled to announce that the River Restaurant Group has partnered with Diamond D Ranch to provide fresh local beef at our restaurants in both Jacksonville and St. Augustine!  Please check out the video to hear about their amazing cattle farm and more on our partnership.
With a restaurant perched high atop a prominent Riverside building, the team behind River & Post took a commanding view of Jacksonville’s landscape and entered the city’s culinary scene with a delectable seafood-forward menu and easily the best rooftop view in town. While the 450-seat restaurant offers great food, atmosphere and cocktails, the rooftop lounge offers some of the most unique cocktails in town that are handcrafted nightly for guests.

Careers
If you're an experienced hospitality industry veteran, we want to hear from you now!
Please click the button below to send us an email with an attached resume for us to review.
Apply Now
For Galleries
For Albums

Our event spaces
When it comes to events, we have your group covered! From small intimate dinner gatherings to large cocktail hours with the best views in town, we have it all. Wondering how to make your group have the best night ever?  Find your perfect event space below and then email our Events Coordinator at events@river-grp.com or call at (904)233.4110 for special pricing on your event.
Post StReet Lounge | Rooftop
Accommodates:
30 to 35 Guests
Combine this space with seating from our main rooftop patio to accommodate up to 100 guests.
Special Features:
Covered by a retractable awning
Appetizers served buffet style for your guests
River Lounge | Rooftop
Accommodates:
20 Guests
Special Features:
Sunset views
Open-air seating
Appetizers served buffet style for your guests
All seating on Friday and Saturday nights is first come, first served on the rooftop. We do not book large private events on Friday and Saturday evenings on the rooftop
All private events must be finalized no later than 48 hours prior to the start of the event.
St. johns room | Downstairs
Accommodates:
20 to 24 Guests
Special Features:
AV Equipped with 55" LCD TV with HDMI Hookup
(Please make sure your computer has a standard HDMI port)
Window views
Glass walls
oak room | downstairs
Accommodates:
12 Guests
Special Features:
Also known as the “Chef’s Table”
park room | downstairs
Accommodates:
Up to 20 Guests
Special Features:
AV Equipped with 55" LCD TV with HDMI Hookup
(Please make sure your computer has a standard HDMI port)
Window shutters can be closed to create additional privacy
OAK & park room COMBINATION | Downstairs
Accommodates:
Up to 36 Guests
Special Features:
AV Equipped with 55" LCD TV with HDMI Hookup
(Please make sure your computer has a standard HDMI port)
Window shutters can be closed to create additional privacy
Provides opportunities for various table set-ups
Can be used as an indoor cocktail hour space
Adjustable lighting to brighten the room for a meeting or dim the space for a dinner
Large private events are only held Sunday through Saturday except during brunch hours. The rooftop may only be booked Sunday after 4pm through Thursday. Food & Beverage Minimums for the Rooftop Lounge are determined based on guest count, space required and time frame. Food & Beverage Minimums downstairs give your group access to the space for an extended period of time. Please contact our Events Coordinator for more specific information regarding our F&B Minimums.
Please visit our FAQs page
here
for more information on parking, large parties and hours of operation.
Thank you for choosing River and Post for your special event! We will respond to all requests in the order at which they are received as all events are booked on a "first contracted" basis. Your understanding and patience is appreciated as we work to plan your best event yet!
Contact Us!
FOR PRIVATE CONTRACTED EVENTS:
events@river-grp.com or 904.233.4110
END .sqs-gallery-meta-container
